title: Pet Shop Passion
description: World famous bass guitarist Mikael Alfredsson was always the life of the party and the one everyone could always count on when they needed a good laugh. Since he met Liza, however, all that changed, leaving him a shell of his former self.After travelling to Lancaster, Pennsylvania for a wedding and seeing how life away from the LA music scene has helped his friend, he wants that too.Hannah Davidson, owner of the hottest pet store in Lancaster and friend of the bride, meets Mikael and is instantly attracted to him. She’s forced to hide that since Mikael is already spoken for, and even if he wasn’t, he was so far out of her league, she wouldn’t stand a chance with him.Will Mikael be able to escape Liza’s clutches and convince Hannah his feelings for her are real, or will they miss their chance at a happily ever after?
author: Samantha C. Michaels
